word:
Let songs pour forth from lips that the live coal from off the altar has touched. Lift up your voices in the words of the 121st, 125th, and 126th psalms. The angelic host will join with those who sing with the spirit and with the understanding also.--Ms 123, 1899. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D. C. January 23, 1987. Entire Manuscript.
